adDetails: Hello People of craigs list I would like to offer my service in Illustration and design Have an Idea for the next Children book but don't know where to start Making this idea into realty. I am an illustrator with years of experience in the field. I have worked with multitudes of clients big and small. feel free to contact me if you have any questions about project or how I can bring it to reality. I'm confident I can bring you great value on your quest to bring a great product to market. I offer the following. - Illustrator with experience and a Wide range of style - work hard for best design and art for your projects - Will meet deadline for your project - Have affordable rates that can meet your budget for your project
